name: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
description:
Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children is an action game. It was originally released in 2010. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children on PSP.
It was produced by Ichiro Hazama, Shinji Hashimoto and Yoshinori Kitase. It was directed by Tetsuya Nomura. Nobuo Uematsu scored the game.
